channel.title: Wonder Woman on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Gal Gadot Gets Choked Up, Requests “Urgent” Prayers for Israeli Hostages Amid Gaza Conflict
item.description: The actress attended a United Hatzalah of Israel gala in Los Angeles at which she presented an award to Nova Music Festival survivor and Eurovision breakout star Yuval Raphael.

item.description: She is also behind DC Studios’ ‘Teen Titans’ movie.

item.title: James Gunn Says Casting for New Wonder Woman Hasn’t Started Yet But Film Is a “Priority”
item.description: The ‘Superman’ director also shut down rumors that DC Studios is looking to cast an actress “with a TV-centric resume, akin to Supergirl’s Milly Alcock" for the titular role.

item.title: James Gunn Says Casting for New Wonder Woman Hasn’t Started Yet But Film Is a “Priority”
item.description: The ‘Superman’ director also shut down rumors that DC Studios is looking to cast an actress “with a TV-centric resume, akin to Supergirl’s Milly Alcock" for the titular role.
